name: Girls PLAY Sports-Track and Fitness
description: Empower yourself with our all-girls track and fitness class! This dynamic program focuses on sprints, middle distances, and agility training to boost your speed, endurance, and overall fitness. Tailored for all fitness levels, our supportive environment encourages personal growth, teamwork, and confidence. Join us to enhance your athletic skills, make new friends, and have fun while staying fit! At the end of the session, there will be a track meet.

howToGetIt: Register online at sfrecpark.org/register or call the registration hotline at (628) 652-2900
cost: This is a fee based service.
